summary: On her latest assignment, a journalist for Elle immerses herself in a prostitution ring run by university students.
cast: Juliette Binoche|Anaïs Demoustier|Joanna Kulig|Louis-Do de Lencquesaing|Krystyna Janda|Andrzej Chyra|Ali Marhyar|Jean-Marie Binoche|François Civil|Pablo Beugnet|Valérie Dréville|Jean-Louis Coulloc'h|Arthur Moncla|Scali Delpeyrat|Laurence Ragon|Alain Libolt|Swann Arlaud|Nicolas Layani|Laurent Jumeaucourt|José Fumanal|Martine Vandeville|Jenny Bellay|Tom Hénin|Anaïs Fabre|Mateusz Kosciukiewicz
title: Ellas
